titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 6) to enhance energy conservation and research and development, to provide for security and diversity in the energy supply for the American people, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 127.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-376, by Mr. Hastings (WA).
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 6 with 1 hour of general debate.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 443.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 193 (Roll no. 628).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 167 (Roll no. 629).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/18/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 6 (Energy Policy Act of 2003).
